Want some beer? This is a cool spot to go to.  I tried Granny's Brewery which is a hot beer with some apple and topped with cinnamon and cream.  Clearly like a warm apple pie.  The interior of the place has such a cool and chill vibe.  There's a bar when you first enter and if you turn left there's a place for you to eat and drink; if you turn right you'll see the dining area. What makes this place stand out a lot of the service of the waitress.   She was attentive and was knowledgeable about beer ans was also welcoming.  I'd love to come back here again.
